tool_description: Get clear and precise translation of the entire Quran
name: Quran
title: Quran

api_list.name: Get a specific Surah and Ayah
api_list.description: This endpoint will return a specific Surah with its respective verses.

api_list.name: Get all the Surahs and Ayahs of the Quran.
api_list.description: The base endpoint provides access to the entire Quran, including all Surahs and their respective verses.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://quran15.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quran15.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://quran15.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quran15.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
